name: LFO
description: A flexible multi-channel low frequency oscillator with various waveforms, sync options, and phase-locking capabilities. Offers Stepped quality for parameter automation or Linear quality for CV outputs.

parameters.name: Quality
parameters.description: Sets the LFO output quality. Stepped is low CPU for parameter automation, Linear for CV outputs.

parameters.name: Clock input
parameters.description: The bus to use as the clock input.

parameters.name: Reset input
parameters.description: The bus to use as the reset input.

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description: Enables the channel.

parameters.name: Speed
parameters.description: Sets the LFO speed, from 0.05Hz to 15Hz with an exponential scaling.

parameters.name: Multiplier
parameters.description: Sets a multiplier for the LFO speed.

parameters.name: Sine
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of a sine wave to add into the LFO output.

parameters.name: Triangle
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of a triangle wave to add into the LFO output.

parameters.name: Saw
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of a saw wave to add into the LFO output.

parameters.name: Square
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of a square/pulse wave to add into the LFO output.

parameters.name: Pulse width
parameters.description: Sets the pulse width of the square/pulse wave.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Adds a constant voltage to the LFO output.

parameters.name: Asymmetry
parameters.description: Sets the asymmetry. This is somewhat like applying a pulse width variation to a square wave, but applies equally to all the waveforms.

parameters.name: Random
parameters.description: Adds a stepwise random voltage to the LFO output.

parameters.name: Phase
parameters.description: Phase-locks LFOs. Sets phase relationship to LFO 1 for channels 2-4.

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: The LFO output bus.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

parameters.name: Sync
parameters.description: Selects how the LFO will sync to external clocks or MIDI.

parameters.name: Clock multiplier
parameters.description: Sets the clock multiplier, if syncing to external clocks.

parameters.name: MIDI divisor
parameters.description: Sets the MIDI clock divisor, if syncing to MIDI clock.
